timeline.title: Your 14-Day Transformation Journey
timeline.subtitle: Each day builds upon the last, creating lasting change

day1.title: Foundation & Breath
day1.description: Learn basic poses and breathing techniques. Start your transformation with mindful awareness.

day2.title: Strength Building
day2.description: Build core strength with warrior poses and planks. Feel your body getting stronger.

day3.title: Flexibility Focus
day3.description: Deep stretches and hip openers. Release tension and increase mobility.

day4.title: Balance & Stability
day4.description: Tree pose and single-leg stands. Develop physical and mental balance.

day5.title: Flow Sequence
day5.description: Connect breath with movement in sun salutation variations.

day6.title: Power Practice
day6.description: Challenge yourself with stronger poses and longer holds.

day7.title: Reflection & Rest
day7.description: Gentle restorative poses and meditation. Honor your practice.

day8.title: Advanced Poses
day8.description: Introduction to arm balances and deeper backbends.

day9.title: Mindful Movement
day9.description: Slow, intentional practice focusing on alignment and awareness.

day10.title: Heart Opening
day10.description: Chest and shoulder opening poses to release emotional tension.

day11.title: Twisting & Detox
day11.description: Spinal twists to cleanse the body and improve digestion.

day12.title: Integration Practice
day12.description: Combine all learned elements in flowing sequences.

day13.title: Peak Challenge
day13.description: Advanced poses and challenging sequences. Test your limits.

day14.title: Celebration & Gratitude
day14.description: Complete your transformation journey with joy and gratitude practice.

introduction.content: At YogaTransform, we are committed to your satisfaction with our 14-day yoga transformation program. This Refund Policy outlines the terms and conditions under which refunds may be requested.

eligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
eligibility.intro: Refunds may be requested under the following circumstances:

qualifies.title: What Qualifies for a Refund
qualifies.technical: Technical issues that prevent access to the program content
qualifies.satisfaction: Dissatisfaction with the program within the first 7 days
qualifies.access: Inability to access purchased content due to our technical problems
qualifies.description: Significant discrepancy between program description and actual content

noRefund.title: What Does Not Qualify for a Refund
noRefund.completion: Completion of more than 50% of the program content
noRefund.days: Refund requests made more than 30 days after purchase
noRefund.abuse: Abuse of our refund policy or fraudulent requests
noRefund.digital: Change of mind after accessing digital content

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.content: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for most purchases.
guarantee.days: You have 30 days from purchase to request a refund
guarantee.conditions: Subject to eligibility conditions outlined above

processing.title: Processing Time
processing.content: Once approved, refunds are processed according to the following timeline:
processing.review: 1-2 business days for review and approval
processing.payment: 3-10 business days for payment processing (varies by payment method)

request.title: How to Request a Refund
request.intro: To request a refund, please follow these steps:

steps.title: Refund Request Process
steps.contact: Contact our support team at refunds@yogatransform.com
steps.provide: Provide your order number and account email address
steps.reason: Explain the reason for your refund request
steps.wait: Wait for our team to review and respond within 2 business days

required.title: Required Information
required.email: Email address associated with your account
required.reason: Detailed reason for the refund request

methods.title: Refund Methods
methods.intro: Refunds will be processed using the same payment method used for the original purchase:

partial.title: Partial Refunds
partial.intro: In some cases, we may offer partial refunds:

situations.title: Partial Refund Situations
situations.progress: Significant progress through the program (25-50% completion)
situations.technical: Technical issues affecting only part of the content

calculation.title: Partial Refund Calculation
calculation.content: Partial refunds are calculated based on unused content and time remaining in your access period.

important.title: Important Notes
important.cancel: You can cancel your subscription at any time to prevent future charges
important.prorated: Refunds for current billing periods may be prorated
important.access: Access continues until the end of your current billing period

exchanges.title: Exchanges and Credits
exchanges.content: We do not offer exchanges for digital content. All sales are final except as provided in this refund policy.
exchanges.alternative: As an alternative to refunds, we may offer account credits for future purchases on a case-by-case basis.

resolution.title: Resolution Process
